it.polimi.se2019.controller.actions

Interface AddActionMethods

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AddFireModeMethods
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Action, Grab, GrabAdrenaline, GrabFrenzy, Move, MoveFrenzy, Shoot, ShootAdrenaline, ShootFrenzyGroup1, ShootFrenzyGroup2

    public interface AddActionMethods
extends AddFireModeMethods
    this methods must be implemented by Action classes to permit a correct comunication. They also include the AddFireMode methods of the firemodes
    Author:
    Galluccio

    • Method Detail

      • addReload

        void addReload(int weaponID)
        throws WrongInputException,
               NotPresentException,
               NotEnoughAmmoException,
               WeaponIsLoadedException
        add a reloading command input
        Parameters:
        weaponID - the ID of the weapon which must be reloaded
        Throws:
        WrongInputException - if invalid input
        NotPresentException - if the player doesn't have the weapon
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player doesn't have enough ammo
        WeaponIsLoadedException - if the weapon is already loaded

      • addFireMode

        void addFireMode(int fireModeID)
          throws WrongInputException
        add a firemode input
        Parameters:
        fireModeID - the ID of the firemode
        Throws:
        WrongInputException - if invalid input

               throws WrongInputException
        add a Discard Weapon command input
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - the weapon card to discard
        Throws:
        WrongInputException - if invalid input
